name: gql-in-ts
description: A type-safe way to write GraphQL.

scripts.fix: npm run fix:eslint && npm run fix:prettier
scripts.check: npm run check:prettier && npm run check:eslint && node typecheck.mjs
scripts.schema: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.cli.json && node ./dist/compileGraphqlSchema.js ./src/testing/schema.graphql ./src/testing/schema.ts --import-path "../graphql" && eslint ./src/testing/schema.ts --fix &&  prettier ./src/testing/schema.ts --write

author: ykiu
